C

callRead(String) - Method in class Parser
find the variables in a read command, and call read function in Action class
callWrite(String) - Method in class Parser
find the variables in a write command, and call write function in Action class
canWait(Transaction) - Method in class Variable
check if a transaction can wait for efficiency, there is no need to add a lock to the wait list if there exists an older transaction, so the time stamps of the transactions in the wait list should be in strict decreasing order
changeActive(boolean) - Method in class Lock
changeActive when the lock is released mark it as inactive so that all other objects storing that lock will immediately get the signal that the lock is released
changeReadReady(boolean) - Method in class Variable
when a site recovers, mark it false for all replicated variables and mark it true for all non-replicated variables, when a write is done, mark it true
changeValue(int) - Method in class Variable
change the value when a write operation is performed
cleanLock() - Method in class Variable
clean lock when a transaction ends or a site fails, the lock release process will be triggered from the corresponding objects, so a lock which has been released will be marked as inactive but still exist in the variable lock list, such locks should be removed whenever the variable object is visited
cleanWait() - Method in class Variable
clean wait if a lock is in the wait list and is never acquired because the transaction aborts or the site fails, it should be removed from the wait list
containsReadOnly(String) - Method in class Transaction
check if contains Read Only
containsVariable(String) - Method in class Site
check if the variable list contains a variable
